sentences.sContent: In 1862, a technique was contrived to take a series of photographs showing stages of movement.
sentences.sCn: 1862年时发明了一种技术，可以拍出一连串展示连续动作的照片。

remMethod.val: contri(反) + ve(=ven走) → (和普通人)反着走 → 设计(新东西) → 计划， 设计

words.tran: 人为的；做作的；不自然的
发明；发明物；想出的办法；计谋

trans.tranOther: to make or invent something in a skilful way, especially because you need it suddenly
